recorded_prompt_builder¶

Classes¶

RecordedPromptBuilder

Builds a prompt based on a recorded audio file

Module Contents¶

class recorded_prompt_builder.RecordedPromptBuilder¶

Builds a prompt based on a recorded audio file

Most functions are used by a prompt builder, as the way to generate a prompt may vary and get a bit complex

convert_recorded_audio_prompt_path(recorded_audio_prompt_path: str, prompt_mp3_file_name=None)¶

Convert the recorded audio prompt to mp3

Args:

recorded_audio_prompt_path: The path to the recorded audio file prompt_mp3_file_name: The name of the mp3 file to save the recording as

set_subtitles(subs: list[pysrt.SubRipItem])¶

set the prompt text using an LLM which extracts it from the recorded file

set_text(text: str)¶

Set the text prompt

Args:

text: The text prompt

build()¶
